question: [File: aptos-core/crates/transaction-generator-lib/src/p2p_transaction_generator.rs] [Function: P2PTransactionGeneratorCreator::new()] [Amount validation missing] No validation that amount parameter is non-zero or within reasonable bounds - can amount=0 or amount=u64::MAX break transfer logic?
